EmailTemplate.name: SGT-WA037_October16-17_2012.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: REGISTRATION CONFIRMATION: Billing Software Group Training in Wenatchee WA, on October 16-17, 2012
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Registeration Confirmation Thank you for registering for Billing Software Group Training in Wenatchee WA, on October 16-17, 2012. Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Billing Customer}},
This is your confirmation email. A reminder will be sent later as the date gets closer.
If you selected credit card payment, a TriTech representative will contact you for your payment information.
If you have questions or if there is anything we can help with to make this a better experience for you, please contact us at:
Wayne Walker, LifeLine Ambulance wwalker@eaglegroup.com <mailto:wwalker@eaglegroup.com> | 509-422-6977
Brenda Taylor, TriTech Software Systems Brenda.Taylor@tritech.com <mailto:Brenda.Taylor@tritech.com> | 800-537-3927 ext 6233
DATE: October 16-17, 2012 (2 full days of training)
HOSTS: LifeLine Ambulance Inc. (Wenatchee, WA ) Classroom Style (you are welcome to bring a laptop to follow along if you'd like)
TRAINING LOCATION: 501 North Wenatchee Ave. Wenatchee WA 98801
SAMPLE AGENDA: Click here to download <http://www.tritechems.com/documents/_UG/Sample_2-day_Group_Training_agenda.pdf>
RECOMMENDED HOTEL: Cedars Inn 80 Ninth Street NE|Esat Wenatchee WA, 98802 Website: http://eastwenatcheecedarsinn.com Telephone: 509-886-8000 Rate: $60.00 (2 Queen Beds Deluxe Non Smoking) (Ask for "LifeLine / Eagle System" for Group Rate before Sept. 14, 2012)
**Tritech retains the right to cancel this event 30 days prior if registrations are below the minimum required.**
